talk.author: did:plc:2qrbtow2425plc7wsbmjlemz
talk.utter: The commendation was implemented by states who did this to varying success. The blue states went the most stringent and still had more death per capita then red states. Do not put that on Trump.

talk.author: did:plc:7iywgqdeaupb7x37icv447ju
talk.utter: I put it all on Trump. The buck stops with the President.

talk.author: did:plc:2qrbtow2425plc7wsbmjlemz
talk.utter:
The president does not have control over the states. How they implemented lockdowns is on them. They were the tools of their own economic demise.

The fact you do not understand this explains your inability to be honest about where the blame should be placed.
